course_description: The structure and organization of computer operating systems. Process, memory, and I/O management; device drivers, exception handling, and interprocess communication. Students write an operating system as a course-long project.
prerequisites: CS 350 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1463, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:40-3:55p, Instructor: K. Mandelberg, Status: Open
